meanings.sent1: Speleologies involve researching caves to learn more about them.

meanings.definition: The exploration and study of caves.
meanings.sent1: Speleologies can be both exciting and educational for adventurers.
meanings.sent2: Many enthusiasts enjoy the thrill of speleologies in unknown caverns.
